message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $900,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $850,000 for it at this time. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $850,000 is still a bit below what I'm looking for.  I'm willing to come down to $875,000.  This takes into account the value you place on the product and allows for a fair deal for both of us. Let's see if we can reach an agreement!

Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to meet you at $875,000. My maximum budget remains at $850,000. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations.
